Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardManagerObserver, FaithTrackObserver, MarketObserver, ModelObserver, ResourceManagerObserver
public class VirtualClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelObserver, ResourceManagerObserver, FaithTrackObserver, CardManagerObserver, MarketObserver
Represent a Client in the Server.
